  • Reference

    R6 Class for recipe equipment

    Equipment.Rd

    R6 Class for recipe equipment

    Creating the equipment object

    An Equipment object is an R6 object, and it can be created using Equipment$new(). The name of the equipment piece is required, and the quantity can be omitted if desired.

    name

    Scalar character vector; the name of the piece of equipment.

    quantity

    Scalar numeric vector; the number of equipment units needed. Defaults to 1.
